plot outline: A struggling comic book artist, Vicky Velingkar (Sonalee Kulkarni) gets accidentally entangled in a peculiar murder mystery. She tries probe the mysterious case when she realizes that nothing is what it seems and the Masked Man who has killed her best friend is now on to her. In a race against time, Vicky now has to find the truth about the killer before he will hunt her down.
title: Vicky Velingkar
plot: A struggling comic book artist, _Vicky Velingkar_ (qv) (Sonalee Kulkarni) gets accidentally entangled in a peculiar murder mystery. She tries probe the mysterious case when she realizes that nothing is what it seems and the Masked Man who has killed her best friend is now on to her. In a race against time, Vicky now has to find the truth about the killer before he will hunt her down.::SV

Vicky Velingker is called on the crime scene by Inspector Sankarsh Salunkhe upon the death of her scientist friend Shruti.Vicky then takes the help of a friend Lucky Lokhande whose a hacker.Luxky tells Vicky that Shruti had sent him a mail in which she was mentioning about a device created by her but was shot by a mask men.Vicky tries to find the mask man whose next target is Vicky.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
